title: FBI uses ANOM messaging app to trick criminals, dealing "heavy blow against organized crime"
content:
1. FBI uses ANOM messaging app to trick criminals, dealing "heavy blow against organized crime"  CBS News
  2. For years, the underworld thought its phones were safe. They fell for an encrypted app trap  CNN
  3. ANOM: Hundreds arrested in massive global crime sting using messaging app  BBC News
  4. How an informant and a messaging app led to global sting  Bangkok Post
  5. Australian police arrest over 200 after cracking underworld messaging app  FRANCE 24 English
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: FBIがメッセージングアプリ「ANOM」を使って犯罪者を騙し、"組織犯罪に大打撃 "を与える
美国联邦调查局利用ANOM短信应用程序欺骗罪犯，对 "有组织犯罪给予沉重打击"
美國聯邦調查局利用ANOM短信應用程序欺騙罪犯，對 "有組織犯罪給予沉重打擊"
